title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-2.13 - Distribution facilities
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 58-2.13 - Distribution facilities

State Regulations
A blood bank may operate a distribution facility, provided the department is notified, in advance, of the location and activities to be performed at the site. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
58-2.13

Amended

New

York State Register July 29, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 30, eff. 9/27/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
